channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Studying The Greatest Speeches In American History Can Change You (And Your Children) Forever
item.description: We simply started with the words. For the foundation of all learning, all communication, and all thought, is words.

item.title: Border czar Tom Homan says ICE took 'bad people' off the streets of Los Angeles

item.title: In Attempt To Insult Top Women’s Sports Defender, Simone Biles Confirms Difference In The Sexes
item.description: Biles’ public ‘female-only sport for me but not for thee’ approach to the issue is not only hypocritical, but incredibly unpopular.

item.title: How Republicans Can Make the Tax Bill More Pro-Growth
item.description: They should insist on making full expensing for capital investment permanent for all businesses.

item.title: Restoring Order in Los Angeles
item.description: The first step is for left-wing residents of L.A. to stop harassing and assaulting federal officers for doing their jobs.

item.title: Predatory Pricing Is More Myth Than Market Threat
item.description: Basic economic ideas explain why most alleged cases of predatory pricing represent something else entirely.

item.title: America Loses If Russia Wins
item.description: If America relinquishes its leadership of the free world, our economy, our security, and our future will be in peril.

item.title: To Execute The Trump Agenda, DOJ’s Civil Rights Division Cannot Be Stuck Understaffed

item.title: Newsom threatens lawsuit over National Guard deployment; White House calls him 'too weak'
item.description: The clash escalated Monday between the White House and California Gov. Gavin Newsom over the anti-ICE protests in Los Angeles.

item.title: Corporate Media Can’t Defend LA Deportation Riot, So They Downplay And Deny It Instead
item.description: The media have failed to learn their lesson over the last five years.

item.title: Media Insists Illegal Alien Was ‘Wrongly Deported.’ Court Docs Say He’s An MS-13 Human Trafficker
item.description: The left that marketed him as the 'wrongly deported Maryland dad' now downplays his alleged crimes to fit their messaging.

item.title: Democrats Just Can’t Quit the Looters and Rioters
item.description: But if they want to restore their brand, they’ll have to realize that masked arsonists burning down cities must not really be their people.
